entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
